page.title: 05travel
page.content: Apart from going on holiday people travel out of Saffron Walden to work or to go shopping. To the west of our area ia Audley End Railway Station. This is on the London to Cambridge line. Many of the men and some of the women who live in Saffron Walden work in London. Those who do not travel so far work in Harlow, Bishop's Stortford or Cambridge. These are people with white collar managerial and executive jobs. People go to other towns to shop."Doing a Sainsburys" is becoming part of the language. People go to Cambridge to buy upto Â£100 of food at a time from the Sainsburys in Cambridge where there is a large car park. For clothes many people prefer Cambridge or Harlow . There is more choice there and Harlow is cheaper.
